item.title: MHRA Approves Inavolisib for PIK3CA-Mutated Breast Cancer

item.title: Germany: A Magnet for Foreign Doctors, but Losing Its Own
item.description: Credentialing hurdles, visa rules, and bureaucracy continue to shape the decisions of doctors relocating to or from Germany. Medscape News Europe

item.title: The World’s Doctors Are on the Move — Italy Is Hit Hardest
item.description: Regions such as Lombardy, Veneto, and Piedmont are seeing some of the highest numbers of physicians leaving. Medscape News Europe
